definition: غطس gaṭasa i (gaṭs) to dip, plunge, immerse, submerse (في هـ, ه s.o., s.th. into water); to dive, plunge, become immersed, sink, submerge (في in water) II to dip, plunge, immerse, submerse (في هـ, ه s.o., s.th. into water); (Chr.) to baptize (ه s.o.) V to dive; to bathe (في in) غطس gaṭs dipping, plunging, immersion; diving; sinking (trans. and intr.); submersion
